title: Ethereum Game 'Fantasy Top' Pays $1.25M to Twitter Influencers It Turned Into NFT Cards - Decrypt
image_alt: degens Ethereum social media crypto twitter web3 gaming Blast Ansem Trading card game Fantasy Top
description: Crypto influencers got a share of $1.25 million in ETH and potentially millions in Blast Gold for being tradable "heroes" in Fantasy Top.
